fields.name: event_type
fields.doc: Type of event that was aggregated

fields.name: event_count
fields.doc: Number of events in the aggregation window

fields.name: first_event_time
fields.doc: Timestamp of the first event in the window

fields.name: last_event_time
fields.doc: Timestamp of the last event in the window

fields.name: processing_time
fields.doc: When this result was processed (system time)
